entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
